headline: A Look At MPLX (MPLX) Valuation After Analyst Downgrades And Growth Concerns
summary: Raymond James’s downgrade of MPLX (MPLX) to Market Perform, citing limited organic growth prospects for 2026 to 2027 and heavier reliance on M&A and portfolio moves, has sharpened investor focus on the partnership’s risk profile. See our latest analysis for MPLX. The recent downgrades appear to have cooled momentum in the short term, with a 1 month share price return of a 4.6% decline and a year to date share price return of a 1.1% decline, even as the 1 year total shareholder return of 20.3%...

headline: What to Expect From Marathon Petroleum's Q4 2025 Earnings Report
summary: Marathon Petroleum is ready to unveil its fiscal fourth-quarter earnings next month, and analysts project a robust triple-digit earnings growth.

headline: Marathon Petroleum (MPC) Soars 5.9%: Is Further Upside Left in the Stock?
summary: Marathon Petroleum (MPC) saw its shares surge in the last session with trading volume being higher than average. The latest trend in earnings estimate revisions may not translate into further price increase in the near term.
